Displays information for current track on screen

 * None

Returns:
 * None

ff.desc: Skips the playback position forwards by 5 seconds
ff.doc:
Skips the playback position forwards by 5 seconds

Parameters:
 * None

Returns:
 * None
ff.name: ff

getCurrentAlbum.desc: Gets the name of the album of the current track
getCurrentAlbum.doc:
Gets the name of the album of the current track

Parameters:
 * None

Returns:
 * A string containing the Album of the current track, or nil if an error occurred
getCurrentAlbum.name: getCurrentAlbum
returns: * A string containing the Album of the current track, or nil if an error occurred

getCurrentArtist.desc: Gets the name of the artist of the current track
getCurrentArtist.doc:
Gets the name of the artist of the current track

Parameters:
 * None

Returns:
 * A string containing the Artist of the current track, or nil if an error occurred
getCurrentArtist.name: getCurrentArtist
returns: * A string containing the Artist of the current track, or nil if an error occurred

getCurrentTrack.desc: Gets the name of the current track
getCurrentTrack.doc:
Gets the name of the current track

Parameters:
 * None

Returns:
 * A string containing the name of the current track, or nil if an error occurred
getCurrentTrack.name: getCurrentTrack
returns: * A string containing the name of the current track, or nil if an error occurred

getCurrentTrackId.desc: Gets the id of the current track
getCurrentTrackId.doc:
Gets the id of the current track

Parameters:
 * None

Returns:
 * A string containing the id of the current track, or nil if an error occurred
getCurrentTrackId.name: getCurrentTrackId
returns: * A string containing the id of the current track, or nil if an error occurred

getDuration.desc: Gets the duration (in seconds) of the current song
getDuration.doc:
Gets the duration (in seconds) of the current song

Parameters:
 * None

Returns:
 * The number of seconds long the current song is, 0 if no song is playing
getDuration.name: getDuration
returns: * The number of seconds long the current song is, 0 if no song is playing

getPlaybackState.desc: Gets the current playback state of Spotify
getPlaybackState.doc:
Gets the current playback state of Spotify

Parameters:
 * None

Returns:
 * A string containing one of the following constants:
   - `hs.spotify.state_stopped`
   - `hs.spotify.state_paused`
   - `hs.spotify.state_playing`
getPlaybackState.name: getPlaybackState
returns: * A string containing one of the following constants:

getPosition.desc: Gets the playback position (in seconds) in the current song
getPosition.doc:
Gets the playback position (in seconds) in the current song

Parameters:
 * None

Returns:
 * A number indicating the current position in the song
getPosition.name: getPosition
returns: * A number indicating the current position in the song

getVolume.doc:
Gets the Spotify volume setting

Parameters:
 * None

Returns:
 * A number containing the volume Spotify is set to between 1 and 100
getVolume.name: getVolume
returns: * A number containing the volume Spotify is set to between 1 and 100

isPlaying.desc: Returns whether Spotify is currently playing
isPlaying.doc:
Returns whether Spotify is currently playing

Parameters:
 * None

Returns:
 * A boolean value indicating whether Spotify is currently playing a track, or nil if an error occurred (unknown player state). Also returns false if the application is not running
isPlaying.name: isPlaying
returns: * A boolean value indicating whether Spotify is currently playing a track, or nil if an error occurred (unknown player state). Also returns false if the application is not running

isRunning.desc: Returns whether Spotify is currently open. Most other functions in hs.spotify will automatically start the application, so this function can be used to guard against that.
isRunning.doc:
Returns whether Spotify is currently open. Most other functions in hs.spotify will automatically start the application, so this function can be used to guard against that.

Parameters:
 * None

Returns:
 * A boolean value indicating whether the Spotify application is running.
isRunning.name: isRunning
returns: * A boolean value indicating whether the Spotify application is running.

next.doc:
Skips to the next Spotify track

setPosition.desc: Sets the playback position in the current song

Sets the playback position in the current song

 * None
setPosition.name: setPosition
parameters: * pos - A number containing the position (in seconds) to jump to in the current song

setVolume.doc:
Sets the Spotify volume setting

 * None

Reduces the volume by 5

 * None

 * None

 * None
